TEI.2.document_title: Jared Cable to Stephen F Austin, 04-25-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. Cable to Austin, Natchitoches, April 25, 1830. Embarrassments which have prevented him from moving to Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 370
